Text: As much as I appreciate the ripping effort, this is deceptive (whether intentionally or not). The .nfo claims Dolby Digital 5.1, but it also says "shrinked from DVD9". Since Dolby Digital isn't even one of the choices in the disc's setup menu (PCM or DTS), I'm guessing the DTS audio track was a casualty of the shrinking process... because my receiver isn't picking it up. Please be sure to write your .nfo's accurately in the future, and be 100% clear about what is and isn't included. Had I known this was PCM-only, I would have saved myself a lot of time and just gotten the xvid that's on Demonoid.
You want the dual layer version. It's about 7gb.
